alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 13 at 4:59AM AKST until February 14 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM AKST MONDAY FOR THE PRIBILOF ISLANDS... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph with visibility reaching as low as one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
